```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

The program group5 loads an NLS dataset and, upon the specification of two variables, performs a regression and exports the results in a .docx format. To use the program, the user would specify two variables of choice: group5 [var1] [var2]

For example:

group5 ln_wage age
